p.s: Reverse Proxy (web accelerator) PHP compatibility layer
p.d:
Makes reverse-proxing (web accelerator) totally invisible for php applications. Doesn't require php code modifications to handle X-Forwarded-For IP. * Stills allows proxy-aware applications to work with X-Forwarded headers and proxy IP address. * Should work with any web server * Should work with any proxy server
Using this extension with on a non reverse proxied system will result in a security issue.
